TextView.android:text: 1.Move or remove any content that is available.
2.Establish general practices and limits concerning use.
3.Assign its rights and liabilities to all User accounts hereunder.
4.Persons who wish to register an Account must have a valid\n e-mail address, paytm mobile number
5. You agree to update and keep updated all information provided for the purposes of registration.
6.You acknowledge that your participation in any Game(s) available on the Platform is purely voluntary and at your sole discretion and risk.
9.You agree and acknowledge that decision of STB in this regard shall be final.
8.You agree and acknowledge that decision of STB in this regard shall be final.

7.You can also register or log in through your Google or personal e-mail address. You may also be required to provide your mobile number for verification purposes, and verify such mobile number using a one-time passcode sent to your mobile number.
